CustomField.description: Designates whether the term exception approver receives a notification only for the approval request (when set to true) or gets the request assigned to them and receives notification as well (false, which is the default).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Designates whether the term exception approver receives a notification only for the approval request (when set to true) or gets the request assigned to them and receives notification as well (false, which is the default).
CustomField.label: Notify Only
